home.tagline: Global verified talent, ready on demand
home.heroTitle: Connect tour guides, DMCs, agencies, and transport partners with confidence.
home.heroDescription: Guide Validator is the marketplace for licensed professionals. Discover multilingual experts, manage compliance, and keep every engagement audit-ready without sacrificing speed.

enterprise.title: Why enterprises choose us
enterprise.body: Built for compliance teams and operations leaders who need verified partners, granular coverage filtering, and dependable renewals.

localization.title: Always multilingual
localization.body: Eleven fully localized experiences, including RTL support for Arabic and Urdu, so every partner can onboard in their preferred language.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure ready
infrastructure.body: Supabase, Stripe, and Resend integrations are planned from day one, keeping audit trails, renewals, and billing in sync.

cta.title: Ready to validate your supply chain?
cta.body: Schedule a compliance walkthrough with our verification team to see how we keep every document in check.

footer.tagline: Compliance-first marketplace for verified travel professionals.

cta.title: Need region coverage support?
cta.body: Our verification team can help you onboard faster.

billing.description: Upgrade to premium placement or renew your verified badge to stay visible to top agencies.

guide.heading: Guide billing
guide.body: Premium boosts your profile in searches. The verification badge confirms your licensing for one year.

pricing.verification: Verification badge review is {amount} per year.

statuses.incomplete: Checkout incomplete. Finish setup in Stripe.
statuses.incomplete_expired: Checkout session expired before completing payment.
statuses.unpaid: Subscription unpaid. Update your billing details.

alerts.success: Payment confirmed. Your billing details are syncing.
alerts.cancel: Checkout cancelled. No charges were applied.
alerts.error: We couldn't update your billing data yet. Please try again shortly.

verification.title: Guide verification
verification.description: Upload your licensing documents after checkout so we can review and activate your verified badge.
verification.notProvided: This information has not been provided yet
verification.body: Once payment is complete we will prompt you for the required documents. Verification typically completes within 48 hours.

steps.checkStatus: Return to this page to check the status of your verification request.
steps.uploadDocs: Have your government ID, license, and recent photo ready for secure upload.
steps.support: If you need help, contact support with your Stripe receipt number.

not_started.title: No verification on file
not_started.description: Purchase the badge in billing to unlock document uploads and get in the review queue.
